question: Match Column - I with Column - II. Select the option with correct combination.
1. Standing state -> q. Amount of nutrients in the soil at a given time
2. Pioneer species -> r. Species that invade a bare area
3. Detritivores -> s. Breakdown detritus into smaller particles
4. Standing crop -> p. Mass of living material at a given time
explanation: Standing state refers to the amount of nutrients.
Standing crop refers to the biomass (living material).
